sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabimo pred krajem ali predmetom, proti kateremu se nekdo ali nekaj premika ali nanj kaže.

seg.quote: I'm going with her to Australia.
He was pointing to an oil tanker somewhere on the horizon.

sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabimo pred stvarjo, na katero je nekaj pritrjeno ali privezano oziroma se je dotika.

seg.quote: I was planning to tie him to a tree.
He clutched the parcel to his chest.

sense.def:
Beseda
to
izraža položaj nečesa. Na primer, kadar je nekaj
to one's left
, je bliže človekovi levi strani kot desni.

seg.quote: To one side, he could see the block of luxury flats.

sense.def:
Beseda
to
pove, na katero osebo ali stvar je usmerjeno delovanje ali občutek.

seg.quote: He showed the letter to Barbara.
We don't do repairs to farm machines.
They were sympathetic to his ideas.

sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabljamo pred samostalnikom, ki izraža človekov odziv na nekaj.

seg.quote: To his surprise he was offered both jobs.

sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabimo pred osebo, katere mnenje izražamo.

seg.quote: To me it didn't seem necessary.

sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabimo pred stanjem, v katerega nekdo ali nekaj postopoma prehaja.

seg.quote: It had turned to dust over the years.
...her rise to fame.

sense.def:
Beseda
to
stoji pred poimenovanjem zadnje stvari v nekem nizu ali razponu.

seg.quote: Breakfast was from 9 to 10.
The job will take anything from two to five weeks.

sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabljamo pri izražanju časa. Na primer,
five to eight
pomeni pet minut pred osmo uro.

Besedo
to
uporabljamo v izrazih za razmerja in primerjalne količine.

seg.quote: My car does 35 miles to the gallon.

sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabimo pred poimenovanjem nečesa, kar se zgodi hkrati kot nekaj drugega, morda kot odziv na tisto drugo.

seg.quote: To a chorus of laughter the President left the room.

sense.def:
To push a door to
pomeni zapreti vrata, vendar ne popolnoma.

Kadar se nekdo premika
to and fro
, ponavlja gibanje od enega kraja do drugega in nazaj.

seg.quote: All day, he rushed to and fro between his living quarters and his place of work.

sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabimo pred nedoločnikom, da izrazimo namen nekega dejanja.

seg.quote: People would stroll down the path to admire the garden.

sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabimo pred nedoločnikom, da izrazimo svoje stališče ob trditvi, ki jo izrečemo, ali namen, s katerim jo izrečemo.

seg.quote: To be honest, we knew he was there.
To sum up, the law must be changed.

sense.def:
Besedo
to
uporabljamo pred nedoločnikom tudi v drugih stavčnih strukturah, ko govorimo o nekem dejanju ali stanju.

seg.quote: ...the first person to climb Everest.
He was too proud to apologize.
They were lovely to watch.
Some of us have got work to do.
She looked up to find Tony standing there.
